about_the_game:
Embark on a captivating journey as a rising star in the world of art restoration! In this immersive game, you'll breathe new life into precious paintings and photographs, uncovering the hidden stories behind each masterpiece.

As a skilled restorer in the charming town of Fairwood Hills, your talent catches the eye of quirky and endearing characters, each with their own cherished artworks in need of your magic touch. From a farm lady's torn paintings of her father's cherished horses, to a café owner's vandalized movie posters, to a young girl's sticker-covered Oriental art, every restoration is a unique challenge.

Experience the joy of revealing the beauty beneath the damage as you perfect your craft. Piece by piece, you'll mend torn canvases, remove stubborn stickers, and even restore burnt edges to their former glory. Your growing reputation leads you to exciting new locations like the picturesque Brookshire and the vibrant Sunnyside, where more artistic adventures await.

But your journey doesn't stop there! Your Very Own Studio awaits, ready for you to unleash your creativity. Decorate and upgrade your space, unlocking new tools and earning rewards as you progress. Dive into a treasure trove of extras, from jigsaw and coloring puzzles to hidden object games, each with its own delightful theme.

As you restore masterpiece after masterpiece, you'll unravel the heartwarming story of Fairwood Hills and the lives you've touched along the way. With stunning visuals, engaging gameplay, and a cast of unforgettable characters, this is a game that celebrates the magic of art and the power of restoration. Get ready to make your mark in a world where every brushstroke tells a story!

This is a special Collector's Edition release full of exclusive extras you won’t find in the standard version.

The Collector’s Edition includes:
  • 80+ unique levels: hidden object scenes, restoring burnt or torn artworks, coloring by number, and matching stamps
  • Immersive artistic puzzle game with diverse challenges
  • Charming setting with stunning visuals
  • Customizable studio
  • Heartwarming storyline
  • Relaxing music
